usefulItems: silicone bar mould, large baking tray, baking paper, refrigerator
title: Cranberry chocolate snack bars

ingredients.content: 50 g white chocolate, broken into pieces
50 g milk chocolate, broken into pieces

preparations.content: Place all ingredients, except white and milk chocolate, into mixing bowl and chop <b>20 sec/speed 7<b>.

Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and blend <b>20 sec/speed 10<b>. Distribute mixture evenly into a silicone bar mould (see Tips), pressing down firmly to form an even, smooth surface. Place into refrigerator for 1 hour or until set. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Remove bars from refrigerator and unmould onto tray.
Place white chocolate into mixing bowl and melt <b>2 min/50°C/speed 2<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and melt <b>1 min/50°C/speed 3<b> or until smooth. Drizzle bars with white chocolate.
Without cleaning mixing bowl, place milk chocolate into mixing bowl and melt <b>2 min/50°C/speed 2<b>.

Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and melt <b>1 min/50°C/speed 3<b> or until smooth. Drizzle bars with milk chocolate. Transfer into refrigerator until chocolate has set (approx. 20 minutes). Wrap bars in cellophane as a party favour or cut into pieces to serve.

hintsAndTricks: We used the silicone bar moulds available from The Mix Shop™ (www.thermomix.com.au/shop or www.thermomix.co.nz/shop).
You can store these bars in the refrigerator for up to 1 week.
